document_data.caption: A map showing Shan Karsha in Teyla Shan.
document_data.name: Shan Karsha
document_data.mainbody: '''Shan Karsha''' was the dominant peak of the [[Teyla Shan]] mountain range.
document_data.Geography: Shan Karsha stood on the eastern rim of the range near the midpoint of its north to south expanse approximately {{SI|150|mi|k}} southwest of [[Nanhu Oasis]].
document_data.Description: This peak rose to an elevation of {{SI|14331|ft}}.
